meanings.definition: To cook (meat) quickly in a hot pan without added fat.
meanings.sent1: I will panbroil the steak for dinner tonight.
meanings.sent2: She likes to panbroil chicken breasts for a healthy meal.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to panbroil the pork chops in a flash!
meanings.sent4: The sizzling sound of the meat panbroiling filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of panbroiling meat wafted through the house.

meanings.definition: To cook (meat) by direct exposure to heat.
meanings.sent1: Dad will panbroil the burgers on the grill for the barbecue.
meanings.sent2: The chef prefers to panbroil the fish over an open flame.
meanings.sent3: The campers decided to panbroil the sausages over the campfire.
meanings.sent4: The sun seemed to panbroil the desert landscape.
meanings.sent5: The intense heat of the fire panbroiled the marshmallows perfectly.
